thread.title: Politics podcast: Sarah Hanson-Young on the plight of 'Abyan'
thread.title_full: Politics podcast: Sarah Hanson-Young on the plight of 'Abyan'

author: theconversation.com
title: Politics podcast: Sarah Hanson-Young on the plight of 'Abyan'
text:
In this interview, Greens senator Sarah Hanson-Young calls on the government to appoint an independent advocate to protect the interests of the Somali woman known as “Abyan”, who is being held on Nauru. Michelle Grattan also probes Hanson-Young on the Greens' electoral prospects following the ascension of Malcolm Turnbull to the prime ministership.
Whaling Podcast Offshore processing The Greens Sarah Hanson-Young You might also like 1 day to go: on the eve of the election, a string of UKIP gaffes could be making Farage sweat. Nigel Roddis/EPA Election 2015
